    com.github.jamesnetherton.zulip.client.api.stream.request.GetStreamsApiRequest.withIncludeAllActive(boolean)
    Use GetStreamsApiRequest.withIncludeAll(boolean)
    com.github.jamesnetherton.zulip.client.api.stream.StreamService.muteTopic(String)
    Use updateUserTopicPreferences instead
    com.github.jamesnetherton.zulip.client.api.stream.StreamService.unmuteTopic(String)
    Use updateUserTopicPreferences instead
    com.github.jamesnetherton.zulip.client.api.user.request.CreateUserGroupApiRequest.withCanMentionGroup(long)
    Use CreateUserGroupApiRequest.withCanMentionGroup(UserGroupSetting)
    com.github.jamesnetherton.zulip.client.api.user.request.UpdateOwnUserStatusApiRequest.withAway(boolean)
    away is a legacy way to access the user's presence_enabled setting, with away = !presence_enabled
    com.github.jamesnetherton.zulip.client.api.user.request.UpdateUserGroupApiRequest.withCanMentionGroup(long)
    Use UpdateUserGroupApiRequest.withCanMentionGroup(UserGroupSetting)
